Yu lusim mani bilong yu olsem Bikpela i tok, na pe yu kisim em bai i winim gol.
Yu lusim mi na bai mi go.
Yu makim Aron pinis, orait bringim ol pikinini man bilong en na putim siot long ol, na putim let raun long bel bilong ol na pasim laplap long het bilong ol.
Yu makim dispela hap
Yu makim ol king bai ol i mekim save long ol king nogut, na yu kisim wanpela man long senisim yu long mekim wok profet.
Yu makim ol long wel pinis, orait bihain ol yet wantaim lain bilong ol i ken mekim wok pris oltaim oltaim.
Yu makim tasol wanem matmat yu laik kisim, na papa bilong matmat bai i givim long yu na yu ken planim meri bilong yu.
Yu man bilong Galili tasol.
Yu man bilong Rom, a?
Yu man bilong bilip long God na yu save lotu long em na aninit long em na yu save bihainim gutpela pasin oltaim.
Yu man bilong giaman.
Yu man bilong kilim man i dai.
Yu man bilong kilim man, olsem na God i bagarapim yu nau.
Yu man bilong marimari oltaim,
Yu man nogut tru.
Yu man nogut, yu no ken hait na was long haus bilong stretpela man, bilong brukim haus bilong en na stilim ol samting bilong en.
Yu man nogut, yu raus.
Yu mangi nating tasol, na em i bin i stap soldia long taim em i yangpela yet i kam inap nau.
Yu mas abrusim ol rong, na bihainim stretpela pasin na rausim olgeta sin i stap long bel bilong yu.
Yu mas abrusim ol, na bai yu inap i stap gut, na bai yu no inap les long kranki pasin bilong ol.
Yu mas abrusim pasin i no stret, olsem na bai yu no ken kisim bekim nogut.
Yu mas abrusim tru dispela rot na yu mas i go i stap longwe long en.
Yu mas amamas long litimapim nem bilong Bikpela, na long bringim ol namba wan kaikai bilong gaden i go long em.
Yu mas amamas na belgut, long wanem, mi Bikpela, mi mekim planti gutpela pasin long yu.
Yu mas amamas oltaim long givim ofa
Yu mas aninit long God long stretpela pasin bilong yu na God bai i bekim gut long yu.
Yu mas aninit long mi oltaim, na mekim ol stretpela pasin tasol long ai bilong mi.
Yu mas apim het bilong yu na lukluk nabaut, na bai yu lukim ol pikinini bilong yu i bung wantaim na ol i kam long yu.
Yu mas autim tok bilong mi Bikpela olsem, Israel, yu meri bilong brukim marit, yu mas kam bek long mi.
Yu mas bagarapim ol
Yu mas baim ol bulmakau na ol sipsip man na ol pikinini sipsip na wit na wain, bilong ofaim long alta long haus bilong God long Jerusalem.
Yu mas belhat long ol na ranim ol na pinisim ol tru, bai i no gat wanpela i stap long graun.
Yu mas belhat long ol na winim ol
Yu mas beten strong long em na autim olgeta hevi na wari bilong yu.
Yu mas bihainim laik bilong en na mekim wanem samting em i askim yu long mekim.
Yu mas bihainim ol dispela gutpela pasin, na bai papamama bilong yu i belgut tru na i amamas.
Yu mas bihainim olgeta tok Bikpela i givim yu long maus bilong mi, na bai yu ken i stap gut na bai ol i no ken kilim yu i dai.
Yu mas bihainim stret olgeta tok na wokim nau tasol.
Yu mas bihainim tok bilong king
Yu mas bilip
Yu mas bilip long Bikpela
Yu mas bilip long Bikpela bai i helpim yu.
Yu mas bilip tasol, na pikinini bilong yu bai i orait.
Yu mas bilip tasol.
Yu mas bilip tru long God,
Yu mas bringim ol i kam.
Yu mas bringim tok pait bilong ol i go long em.
Yu mas brukim wara hariap na i go kwik long hapsait.
Yu mas daunim het bilong yu long ai bilong ol bikman.
Yu mas daunim ol na paulim ol tru,
Yu mas daunim ol na paulim ol,
Yu mas daunim yu yet olgeta.
Yu mas givim baksait
Yu mas givim bekim nogut long dispela man wantaim ol ami bilong em.
Yu mas givim dispela tok long ol Livai na bai ol i mekim olsem.
Yu mas givim kaikai long ol manmeri i hangre, na yu mas givim klos long ol manmeri i sot long klos.
Yu mas givim kaikai long ol na bihain ol i ken i go bek long king bilong ol.
Yu mas givim mi laip,
Yu mas givim mi nau.
Yu mas givim ol Livai long mi olsem gutpela presen, na Aron wantaim ol pikinini man bilong en i mas bosim ol.
Yu mas givim ol gutpela presen long ol manmeri i stap yet, na tingting gut tu long ol manmeri i dai pinis.
Yu mas givim ol samting long ol olsem lo i tok, em ol namba wan pikinini kaikai bilong gaden na ol ofa bilong rausim sin na ofa bilong lek samting bilong abus na ol arapela ofa i holi na ol samting i tambu.
Yu mas givim ol samting long ol rabisman, na Bikpela bai i mekim gut tru long yu.
Yu mas givim tok bilong mi long ol, maski ol i putim yau gut, o nogat.
Yu mas givim wanpela nupela tok long ol bilong senisim dispela tok.
Yu mas givim wok long ol Livai bilong bosim haus sel bilong mi na ol samting i stap insait long en, na bilong mekim wok long en.
Yu mas givim wok long wanpela man i save pinis long katim tok long ston, na em i mas putim nem bilong ol pikinini man bilong Jekop long dispela tupela ston.
Yu mas go bek long as ples bilong mi na painim wanpela meri namel long ol lain bilong mi yet, na bringim em i kam, bai em i ken maritim pikinini bilong mi, Aisak.
Yu mas hariap i kam bek kwiktaim.
Yu mas helpim mi
Yu mas helpim mi.
Yu mas helpim mipela
Yu mas helpim mipela, long wanem, olgeta mani bilong mipela i pinis.
Yu mas helpim ol rabisman
Yu mas helpim ol stretpela man
Yu mas holim mi tasol.
Yu mas holimpas dispela tok bilong mi, na putim gut long tingting bilong yu.
Yu mas i go askim em long rausim promis bilong yu.
Yu mas i go bek na stap wantaim King Apsalom.
Yu mas i go hait long gaden.
Yu mas i go insait long dispela sip wantaim meri bilong yu na ol pikinini bilong yu wantaim ol meri bilong ol.
Yu mas i go long graun bilong Mesopotemia, long ples bilong Betuel, em papa bilong mama bilong yu.
Yu mas i go long lain bilong papa bilong mi na painim wanpela meri bilong maritim pikinini bilong mi.
Yu mas i go na kukim bret olsem yu bin tok.
Yu mas i go paslain long ol manmeri long kisim dispela graun Bikpela i bin promis long ol tumbuna long givim yupela.
Yu mas i go stret long haus bilong dispela meri na putim stik wokabaut bilong mi antap long pes bilong dispela mangi.
Yu mas i kam na bai mi givim yu planti samting na bai mi mekim olgeta samting yu laik mi mekim.
Yu mas i stap aninit long Bikpela long bel bilong yu olgeta, na mekim gut long ol pris bilong em.
Yu mas i stap gut wantaim meri bilong yu, na slip wantaim em wanpela tasol, olsem man i dring wara long hul wara bilong em yet.
Yu mas i stap isi.
Yu mas i stap long wanpela hap bilong dispela graun, em bai mi tokim yu long en.
Yu mas i stap longwe long ol birua bilong yu, na lukaut na skelim gut ol pren bilong yu.
Yu mas i stap longwe long ol man i no gat gutpela tingting.
Yu mas i stap longwe long ol manmeri i save bikhet long Bikpela na long king.
Yu mas i stap longwe tru long kain meri olsem.
Yu mas i stap na wok wantaim ol wokmeri bilong mi.
Yu mas i stap poroman na pren bilong mipela.
Yu mas i stap stret, bai olgeta samting yu mekim i ken kamap gut.
Yu mas i stap wantaim em inap bel bilong brata bilong yu i kol, na em i lusim tingting long samting yu bin mekim long em.
Yu mas i stap wantaim mi
Yu mas i stap wantaim mi.
Yu mas kaikai dispela kain bret tasol long dispela de yu slip long sait bilong yu.
Yu mas kam bek long God I Gat Olgeta Strong na bai em i pinisim olgeta hevi bilong yu na givim yu gutpela sindaun gen.
Yu mas kam bek long mi
Yu mas kam kwik na helpim mipela.
Yu mas kam na marimari long mi.
Yu mas kirap i go toktok long ol soldia na mekim gut bel bilong ol.
Yu mas kirap nau na go long graun bilong Juda.
Yu mas kirapim laik bilong mi
Yu mas kirapim wok, na Bikpela i ken i stap wantaim yu.
Yu mas kisim 10-pela bret na sampela bisket na wanpela sospen hani na go givim em.
Yu mas kisim Mikal, pikinini meri bilong Sol, na bringim em i kam bek long mi.
Yu mas kisim bek mi
Yu mas kisim bek mipela.
Yu mas kisim bek ol rabisman long han bilong ol manmeri i wok long mekim nogut long ol, na long kot yu no ken pret long skelim gut ol manmeri.
Yu mas kisim dispela blakpela lewa bilong pis na putim tasol long tupela ai bilong em olsem wanpela plasta.
Yu mas kisim gutpela tingting na gutpela save.
Yu mas kisim kina kina long wan wan man bilong ol, bilong baim bek ol.
Yu mas kisim ol dispela samting olsem pe bilong yu.
Yu mas kisim ol het bali long dispela gaden tasol.
Yu mas kisim ol man yu yet yu save ol i stap hetman na i gat namba namel long ol manmeri.
Yu mas kisim olgeta lain bilong yu na brukim wara hariap na i go long hap.
Yu mas kisim olgeta pikinini bilong yu na ol tambu pikinini bilong yu wantaim ol arapela lain bilong yu i stap hia, na yupela i mas lusim dispela taun.
Yu mas kisim olgeta skul em i laik givim yu, na putim gut ol tok bilong en long bel bilong yu.
Yu mas kisim pikinini man bilong yu, Ahimas, na Jonatan, pikinini man bilong Abiatar, na yupela go bek long taun wantaim bel isi.
Yu mas kisim planti sospen.
Yu mas kisim takis bilong mi, Bikpela, long dispela lain yu laik givim long ol soldia.
Yu mas kotim ol long olgeta stingpela pasin bilong ol.
Yu mas krai long ol manmeri i dai, long wanem, ol i no inap long lukim san moa.
Yu mas krai na mekim pasin bilong man i sori tru.
Yu mas krai strong na tok, Sori tru, klostu bai taim nogut i kamap.
Yu mas krungutim ol
Yu mas laikim em tru olsem mi laikim tumas ol manmeri bilong mi, ol Israel.
Yu mas laikim em tumas na bai em i lukautim yu gut.
Yu mas laikim mi wanpela tasol
Yu mas lainim mi
Yu mas larim hap mita samting namel long rup na banis, bai lait i ken i go insait long sip.
Yu mas larim mipela i kisim ol abus, bilong mekim ofa long God, Bikpela bilong mipela.
Yu mas lukautim em olsem brata bilong yu.
Yu mas lukautim gut ol sipsip na meme bilong yu, long wanem, mani bilong yu i no inap i stap oltaim, na lain bilong king tu i no inap i stap oltaim.
Yu mas lukautim mi
Yu mas lukluk gut long olgeta dispela hap, long wanem, bai yu no inap brukim wara Jordan na i go insait long dispela graun.
Yu mas lusim dispela haus na i go.
Yu mas lusim dispela kalabus, olsem abus o pisin i lusim umben na i ranawe.
Yu mas lusim dispela wok na malolo.
Yu mas lusim tingting
Yu mas makim Aron wantaim ol pikinini bilong en tasol long mekim wok pris, na sapos ol arapela man i traim long mekim dispela wok, bai yupela i mas kilim ol i dai.
Yu mas makim ol dispela samting olsem samting bilong mi stret na bai i tambu tru long ol manmeri.
Yu mas makim ol man i save stap aninit long God, em ol man yumi inap bilip long ol na i no inap ol man i givim mani long ol bilong pulim ol long mekim pasin i no stret.
Yu mas makim ol man long olgeta provins yu bosim, na ol i ken bringim ol naispela yangpela meri i kam long Susa, namba wan taun bilong gavman, na putim ol long haus yu save bungim ol meri long en.
Yu mas marimari long mipela
Yu mas marimari long mitupela na yu no ken mekim mitupela i karim hevi nogut bilong sin bilong mitupela.
Yu mas mekim dispela wok bilong makim Aron wantaim ol pikinini man bilong en i kamap pris, inap long 7-pela de stret olsem mi bin tokim yu.
Yu mas mekim gutpela pasin tasol long dispela de, em de God i save lukim olgeta samting em i bin makim na tambuim.
Yu mas mekim mi i stap laip
Yu mas mekim ol haiden i sanap
Yu mas mekim ol lain manmeri
Yu mas mekim olsem bilong makim Aron na ol pikinini man bilong en, na bai ol i kamap pris.
Yu mas mekim olsem i go inap yu pulapim olgeta dispela sospen.
Yu mas mekim olsem long dispela alta inap long 7-pela de.
Yu mas mekim olsem, long wanem, sapos wanpela meri i lusim man bilong en, na i aigris long yu, orait em bai i mekim planti switpela tok gris bilong pulim yu.
Yu mas mekim olsem.
Yu mas mekim yu yet i kamap olsem meri i sori longpela taim pinis long wanpela man i dai.
Yu mas painim wanpela gutpela meri i gat save.
Yu mas painimaut as bilong ol gutpela tingting bilong ol bikman bilong bipo, na skelim gut save bilong ol tumbuna.
Yu mas pait long ol man
Yu mas pait strong long ol Amon na winim ol na bagarapim dispela taun olgeta.
Yu mas pasim bainat
Yu mas paulim tingting bilong ol na bagarapim ol olgeta.
Yu mas pinisim sori na tingim ol wok i wetim yu.
Yu mas pinisim strong
Yu mas pinisim tru taun Ai na king bilong en, olsem yu bin mekim long taun Jeriko na king bilong en.
Yu mas planim sampela lain kaikai long moningtaim na sampela long apinun tu.
Yu mas prea long Bikpela na bai em i mekim yu i kamap orait.
Yu mas pret long Bikpela na aninit em, na givim biknem tu long ol pris.
Yu mas promis long nem bilong God, Bikpela bilong heven na graun, olsem, bai yu no makim wanpela meri bilong pikinini bilong mi namel long ol meri bilong Kenan, dispela graun mi stap long en.
Yu mas putim ain
Yu mas putim han sut bilong yu antap long het bilong em.
Yu mas putim klos bilong sori, na yu no ken komim gras bilong yu.
Yu mas putim tok bilong mi long tingting bilong yu na em bai i stap oltaim, olsem ring i stap oltaim long pinga bilong yu.
Yu mas putim tok bilong tupela long tingting bilong yu na bihainim gut oltaim, na em bai i kamap olsem gutpela bilas long het na long nek bilong yu.
Yu mas putim yau gut long dispela tok na tingting gut long en.
Yu mas putim yau gut long olgeta tok i save givim yu gutpela tingting.
Yu mas putim yau long olgeta stori bilong God, nogut ol gutpela toktok i abrusim yu na i go lus nating.
Yu mas putim yau long tok bilong ol rabisman, na yu mas bekim gude bilong ol olsem yu save mekim long poroman bilong yu.
Yu mas raitim dispela olgeta samting bai ol i ken lukim na wokim gut dispela haus bilong mi, na bai ol i ken bihainim olgeta lo bilong en.
Yu mas raitim gut, na bai em i isi long ol man i ritim.
Yu mas ranawe
Yu mas ranawe long sin, olsem yu save ranawe long snek.
Yu mas ranim ol na paulim ol tru.
Yu mas rapim dispela blakpela lewa tasol antap long ai bilong man, na winim liklik skin i karamapim ai, na dispela man bai inap long lukluk gen.
Yu mas rausim mi
Yu mas rausim ol i go bek
Yu mas redi kwiktaim long harim tok, na yu mas wet pastaim long bekim tok.
Yu mas redi na ranawe i go i stap wantaim brata bilong mi, Laban, long taun Haran.
Yu mas sambai long ol man i no inap tokaut long hevi bilong ol, na yu mas helpim ol long toktok.
Yu mas sem moa yet, long wanem, taim mi skelim pasin bilong yu wantaim tupela susa bilong yu, mi lukim pasin bilong yu i nogut tru na ol susa i kamap olsem ol meri i no gat sin.
Yu mas semim ol moa yet,
Yu mas singaut long ol, tasol bai ol i no bekim singaut bilong yu.
Yu mas singautim olgeta man long olgeta hap bilong kantri Israel na bungim ol na bai ol i kamap planti moa, olsem ol wesan bilong nambis.
Yu mas skelim gut tru ol wantok, na kisim gutpela tingting long ol manmeri i gat save.
Yu mas skulim mi
Yu mas skulim mi gut
Yu mas skulim ol manmeri long ol dispela lo, bai ol i ken bihainim gut long dispela kantri nau mi laik givim long ol.
Yu mas slip i stap olsem inap de.
Yu mas sori long mi na tokim king long lusim mi long dispela kalabus.
Yu mas sori long mipela
Yu mas sori long ol rabisman
Yu mas sori long ol rabisman.

Yu mas stap longwe long ol manmeri i gat pawa bilong kilim ol arapela manmeri i dai, na bai yu no inap pret long ol i kilim yu.
Yu mas stretim tok wantaim man i laik kotim yu
Yu mas strongim mi
Yu mas strongim tingting bilong Josua, long wanem, em bai i bringim ol Israel i go sindaun long dispela kantri.
Yu mas tenkyu long Bikpela, em i bin mekim yu i kamap.
Yu mas ting dispela samting i bin mekim yu i kros, em i asua bilong mi tasol.
Yu mas tingim Abraham na Aisak na Jekop, ol wokman bilong yu, na yu no ken ting long ol bikhetpasin na rong na sin bilong ol dispela manmeri.
Yu mas tingim gen dispela promis
Yu mas tingim mipela ol wokman bilong yu, na yu mas kam bek na stap wantaim mipela ol lain yu bin makim bilong yu yet.
Yu mas tingim ol arapela manmeri olsem yu tingim yu yet.
Yu mas tingim ol bikhetman
Yu mas tingim strongpela promis yu bin mekim long God na yu no ken sakim tok bilong king.
Yu mas tingting gen
Yu mas tingting gut long pasin bilong yu long taim yu go long haus bilong God.
Yu mas tingting gut long wokabaut bilong yu.
Yu mas tingting gut pastaim long tok bilong yu, na bai mipela inap toktok wantaim yu.
Yu mas tingting gut pastaim, na yu promis long givim ofa long Bikpela.
Yu mas tingting na toktok gut pastaim.
Yu mas tok olsem, Mi Jeremaia, bai mi krai moa yet na wara bai i kapsait long ai bilong mi na ran i go daun long pes bilong mi.
Yu mas tok olsem, Yu king bilong Juda, yu save sindaun long sia king bilong Devit, yu mas harim tok bilong Bikpela.
Yu mas tok olsem, i tambu long Vasti i kam lukim yu gen.
Yu mas tokaut, na yu no ken pret.
Yu mas tokim dispela bus long putim yau gut long tok bilong mi God, Bikpela.
Yu mas tokim em long ol samting nau tasol yu bin tokim mipela long en.
Yu mas tokim em long senisim tingting na pasin bilong em na bai em i no ken lus.
Yu mas tokim em olsem, Mi Bikpela, mi tok, yu kilim dispela man pinis na nau yu laik kisim gaden wain bilong en tu, a?
Yu mas tokim mipela.
Yu mas tokim ol dispela manmeri olsem, Bikpela i stap long ples bilong em yet long heven, na em bai i bikmaus moa yet long ol manmeri bilong en.
Yu mas tokim ol long ol i mas putim yau gut long tok bilong mi, Bikpela.
Yu mas tokim ol long putim yau gut long dispela tok bilong mi, Bikpela.
Yu mas tokim ol taun bilong Juda olsem, Lukim, God bilong yupela i kam nau.
Yu mas tokim ol tu long kisim ol karis bilong Isip i go wantaim ol bilong bringim ol meri na pikinini bilong ol i kam.
Yu mas toksave long mi.
Yu mas was gut long ol, nogut yu painim trabel.
Yu mas was long mi
Yu mas wok long kamap wanbel
Yu mas wok strong olsem soldia bilong mi na yu no ken pret.
Yu mas wokabaut namel long dispela tupela kain pasin.
Yu mas wokim dispela sip olsem, longpela bilong en inap mita na bikpela bilong en inap mita na antap bilong en inap mita.
Yu mas wokim sampela rum insait long en, na penim insait na ausait long kolta.

Yu mekim olsem
Yu mekim olsem bilong kisim bek

Yu mekim olsem long mipela,

Yu mekim olsem,

Yu mekim save long mi

Yu meri bilong bikhet, bilong wanem yu save mekim dispela kain tok?
Yu meri bilong mi
Yu mi laik yu skulim mi gut
Yu mi prea long yu.
Yu mi save mekim.
Yu na bai mi autim tok

Yu na lukautim mi.

Yu na win i bringim tok

Yu naispela meri
Yu naispela meri tru
Yu namba wan pikinini bilong mi, Iso, o nogat?
Yu nambawan king
Yu nambawan king i gat biknem.
Yu nambawan king na yu stap holi.
Yu nambawan meri tru bilong Israel.
Yu nambawan tru, long wanem, mi God, Bikpela, mi bin bilasim yu.
Yu narakain pamukmeri tru.
Yu no bihainim tingting bilong God.
Yu no bihainim tok God, Bikpela bilong yumi, i bin givim yu.
Yu no bin askim mi long planti mani samting o long kisim biknem, na yu no bin askim mi long bagarapim ol birua bilong yu.
Yu no bin bihainim gutpela pasin bilong papa bilong yu, King Jehosafat, na gutpela pasin bilong tumbuna bilong yu, King Asa.
Yu no bin bringim mipela i go long wanpela kantri i gat gutpela graun bai mipela i gat ol gaden kaikai na gaden wain.
Yu no bin giamanim mipela na pulim wanpela samting o mekim nogut long mipela.
Yu no bin givim pikinini long mi.
Yu no bin mekim gutpela wok.
Yu no bin pret liklik long kilim dispela king, Bikpela i bin makim, a?
Yu no bin tokim mi olsem Sarai em i meri bilong yu.
Yu no bin wok liklik long en, na yu no mekim em i kamap bikpela.
Yu no gat king, a?
Yu no gat sik, tasol ating yu bel hevi long wanpela samting.
Yu no inap i dai.
Yu no inap i stap bosboi moa.
Yu no inap kisim biknem sapos yu no daunim yu yet pastaim.
Yu no inap long mi, long wanem, tupela taim ol papa bilong yu i bin lus na ranawe long pait long kantri bilong ol yet.
Yu no inap lukim olgeta.
Yu no inap ranawe long God I Gat Olgeta Strong, em God i save lukim olgeta samting.
Yu no inap ranawe long strong bilong God.
Yu no inap save, lain kaikai yu planim long moning o lain kaikai bilong apinun tasol bai i kamap gut, o tupela lain wantaim bai i kamap gut.
Yu no inap tru long kotim nating wanpela man i no bin mekim rong.

Yu no inap.

Yumi Taim

Yumi bilong God.
Yumi bilong graun,
Yumi bilong sin bilong yumi,
Yumi bin askim ol dispela strongpela kantri long redi long helpim yumi, nogut ol Asiria i kam bagarapim yumi.
Yumi bin bagarap olgeta, na yumi bin kaikai bodi bilong ol pikinini man na pikinini meri bilong yumi yet.
Yumi bin bekim sin pinis long ai bilong Bikpela, na em i belhat moa yet long yumi.
Yumi bin bihainim ol kain kain rot bilong pasin nogut, na yumi bin bagarapim planti samting.
Yumi bin i dai wantaim Krais
Yumi bin i gat planti mani samting na yumi bikhet na yumi ting yumi moa yet.
Yumi bin kamapim ol pikinini, tasol bihain yu kisim ol dispela pikinini bilong mi God, Bikpela, na yu kilim ol na mekim ofa long ol giaman god.
Yumi bin kilim planti Filistia, tasol sapos yumi bin kaikai na kisim strong, yumi inap kilim planti Filistia moa.
Yumi bin lukim em i krai na singaut long yumi bilong helpim em, tasol yumi no bin harim tok bilong em.
Yumi bin makim Apsalom i kamap king bilong yumi, tasol ol i pait na ol i bin kilim em i dai pinis.
Yumi bin mekim planti pasin nogut,

Yumi lukim ol saveman tu,
Yumi lukim pasin bilong wanpela man na yumi ken save, em i gutpela na stretpela man o em i man nogut.
Yumi lukim strong na namba bilong en long taim em i skulim ol manmeri na long taim em i rausim ol spirit nogut na long taim em i lusim sin bilong ol manmeri.
Yumi lukim tu ol man i kamap birua bilong Jisas na ol i givim planti hevi long em.
Yumi lusim ol,

Yumi mekim song

Yumi no inap save

Yupela
Yupela 12-pela i mas kisim wan wan bikpela ston, bilong makim ol 12-pela lain bilong Israel.
Yupela Bai mi singaut strong long ol birua bilong ol manmeri bilong mi, olsem laion i singaut, na bai mi pretim ol.
Yupela Bihain ol lain tumbuna bilong yupela na ol man bilong ol arapela kantri bai i lukim ol dispela samting nogut na bikpela hevi God i bin mekim i kamap long kantri bilong yupela.
Yupela Bikpela Buk Dispela ston ol kamda i ting
Yupela Bikpela God i stretim sindaun bilong ol manmeri bilong en gen
Yupela Bikpela I Gat Olgeta Strong i makim dispela taim bilong daunim olgeta man i save litimapim nem bilong ol yet.
Yupela Bikpela bai i bagarapim ol kantri i stap klostu long kantri Juda
Yupela Bikpela i save laikim.
Yupela Bikpela i tok long givim namba long Serubabel
Yupela Bikpela i tokim Moses long givim dispela tok long ol Israel.
Yupela Bikpela i tokim mi olsem, Taim wanpela laion i stap kaikai sipsip em i bin kilim, em i no inap pret na lusim dispela sipsip na ranawe, maski sapos planti wasman bilong sipsip i kam bung na singaut na bikmaus long en.
Yupela Bikpela traim i kamap long ol Kristen na ol i karim pen

Yupela Dispela God i lukautim mipela,
Yupela Dispela kingdom yumi bin kisim, em i no inap guria.
Yupela Dispela tok nogut i no inap long winim ol stretpela manmeri, na em i no inap long kukim ol.
Yupela Em i go gen namba taim na i beten olsem, Papa bilong mi, sapos dispela kap i no inap abrusim mi, na mi mas dringim, orait yu ken bihainim laik bilong yu tasol.

Yupela Long

Yupela Sapos Sapos Sapos Yupela
